```{r}
library(randomForest)
```
Predict the richness
```{r}

response <- c(
  "richness"
  #"simpson"
  #"shannon"
)
predictors <- c(
  "RecYear", 'FireInterval_yr', 'mean_DPPT', 'mean_DSRAD',
  'mean_DHUMID' 
)

data_subset <- select(final_data, predictors, response)

rf_reg <- randomForest(as.formula(paste(response, "~ .")),
                        data = data_subset,
                        ntree = 500,
                        importance = TRUE)
```
